abstract: New Jersey regulators authorized Wednesday what could be an 80-percent-off sale for one of Atlantic City’s largest casinos, permitting the Tropicana Casino and Resort to be sold in a bankruptcy court auction — possibly to the billionaire financier Carl C. Icahn.
snippet: New Jersey regulators authorized Wednesday what could be an 80-percent-off sale for one of Atlantic City’s largest casinos, permitting the Tropicana Casino and Resort to be sold in a bankruptcy court auction — possibly to the billionaire financier...
lead_paragraph: New Jersey regulators authorized Wednesday what could be an 80-percent-off sale for one of Atlantic City’s largest casinos, permitting the Tropicana Casino and Resort to be sold in a bankruptcy court auction.

headline.main: Icahn Poised as Tropicana Heads for Auction
